X-Yahoo-Profile: o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami

~*Flashback*~

"Are you insane!"

I'm afraid he's gone for good, a shame really he was such a handsome 
creature and quite tasty."

"Negative, the question that once haunted my beings been answered, the 
future is not fixed, my choices are my own, and yet how ironic for I 
now find I have no choice at all... I am a warrior, let the battle be 
joined."

~*Present*~

The carinivour growled deeply, ending in a snarl as it echoed around 
the pred base. Blood red eyes glowed errily as they swivled in their 
sockets, watching the other bots around him. A long tail sweeped back 
and forth, perfectly in sync to his steps. White metallic skin gleaming 
under the lights, the Transmetal 2 Dinobot had been reborn. 

He knew naught how it had happened, or anything before he newal of 
life, but what Megatron now Hydras had told him. He was a Predacon, a 
noble Warrior, that stood proudly next to his leader. He snarled at 
that thought, his tail sweeping agiatatedly. What he had been told was 
after the Maximals destroyed their ship, he had been blown free of the 
wrekage, severaly damaged. Only then afterwards was he found by fellow 
Preds and taken to the CR tanks.

Dinobot made his way through the halls, looking for Hydras. His memory 
circuits were still scrambled, but he had a feeling he was told the 
full truth. Even though his spark was not whole, it still spoke of 
honor.  What is left when honor is lost?

OMWOS
